  • Classes in org.apache.activemq.artemis.api.core.jgroups used by org.apache.activemq.artemis.api.core
    Class
    Description
    JChannelManager
    This class maintain a global Map of JChannels wrapped in JChannelWrapper for the purpose of reference counting.
    JChannelWrapper
    This class wraps a JChannel with a reference counter.
  • Classes in org.apache.activemq.artemis.api.core.jgroups used by org.apache.activemq.artemis.api.core.jgroups
    Class
    Description
    JChannelManager
    This class maintain a global Map of JChannels wrapped in JChannelWrapper for the purpose of reference counting.
    JChannelWrapper
    This class wraps a JChannel with a reference counter.
    JGroupsReceiver
    This class is used to receive messages from a JGroups channel.
